text.ENG: a wide wasteland stretches from your feet to the horizon, drenched in the night sky's cold light.
Only two specks of light emit among the various buildings in front of you.
Next to an abandonded village a few hundred meters ahead lies a mansion...
massive and silent, its windows shedding light into the darkness like judging eyes.
Further down the road there erects a tower upon a hill...
a mysterious aura makes it clear that it is indeed not abandoned.
I've heard stories about the wretched creature that lives inside these halls...
A vampire whose horrors led these villages to be abandoned!

nodes.qte: qte_up qte_down qte_a qte_y qte_right qte_x
nodes.title: QuickTimeEvent

text.ENG: Fine... If anything happens to me... It is your responsiblity!
Don't worry knucklehead, my trusty slingshot will save your enchanted buttocks if worse comes to worst.
I do not want to deal with this. I want people to enjoy the wonders of magic, not draw my last breath.
It looked as if Gandalf needed some convincing. Can you pick the right words?
Scattered, sad-looking candles illuminate the staircase.
Suddenly, you notice a creepy shadow being thrown at the wall next to you.
Guests...? I did not expect guests!
A shiver runs down your spine as you hear the creature's scratchy voice.
I would have served pastries and tea if only i had known!
Fine, you fools! If you insist, I will not parttake in your madness.
Is this meant to be a sadistic innuendo? I won't have it!
Please, not in this harsh tone! I'm tired of all the hatred...
I do not mean you any harm.
The shadowy figure reveals itself from the darkness...
and a tall, well-dressed man with pale skin stands in front of you.
Stand back, or I- I'll shoot!
Stop the situation from escalating!
You hear the leather of David's slingshot stretch, in anticipation of a well-aimed shot at the man infront of you.

nodes.qte: qte_up qte_y qte_down qte_a qte_right qte_x qte_left qte_b
nodes.title: QuickTimeEvent

text.ENG: HYAAAGGHH!
The tall man bolted, and as quickly as he blocked your path, he vanished into the darkness.
His bloodcurdling screach sent you into fight-or-flight, and you dashed ahead with the path to the outside cleared.
David's projectile whizzes through the thin air, and hits its mark.
David, let's hear him out at the very least!
If he wanted us dead, you would not be aiming at him at this very moment.
But we are in dire need for assistance. And there isn't much time left...
literally.
Just a lonely vampire... But do not be afraid!
I hurt no man. I restricted myself to a diet of animal blood.
The villagers did not give me a chance to speak.
They blamed their bruises and diseases on my presence...
and now continue their short-sighted life elsewhere.
Everyone deserves a second chance.
No way in hell would we shake hands with a murderer!
Do you believe his story?
Oh...
I see.
I will not hold you back.
The tall man steps aside, letting you leave without a word.
Unsure if you should have heard him out after all...
Oh adventurer! Thank you for your hindsight. I will not disappoint you.
I am honored to meet you, uhh..
Is he the one illuminating the night sky with his spectacular magic?
I see you brought the wizard.
The wizard blushed, but noone saw it happen in the darkness.
G-Gandalf. Nice to meet you.
The wizard spits on the floor in front of Drakula the vampire as you leave.
You left the mansion behind.
A-are you alone? Yes? I knew you'd know to stay away from foul abominations like him!
There is no reason for me not to join you anymore. Let me tag along!
I didn't want to side with you anyways! You will get yourself killed wherever you are going.
as you defeatedly exit the mansion through the creaking doors, a rustling in the bushes reveals a person's presence:
Accept that you were wrong, and take Gandalf back
He made his choice, he obviously lacks the resolve for the journey ahead
How do we deal with this scaredy-cat?
Thank you!
You parted ways with the wizard...
and as your feet take you elsewhere, you can see his magic illuminating the path in front of you.
The wizard leaves, and you stand alone before the towering building.
You leave the mansion confidently with increased manpower.
And thus, the adventurers continued with a magical companion.
You turn around to run, but the path to the door is blocked.
As you enter, the smell of dusty curtains and rotten floorboards crawls into your noses...
The long and winding road takes you to the tower's entrance.
Its door is unlocked, and opens with a menacing creaking.
or a deadly foe.
They emit magic! This could be a powerful ally...
The rocks this tower is made of...
You climb the tower's stairs, which lead to a platform on the top.
The room is illuminated with colorful lights, you hear birds singing...
but there are no birds.
You feel a soft breeze as you realize that you're being watched.
Halt! It is I, Gandalf the great wizard! Who are you to step into my tower?
I knew it! A Wizard!
What are you doing here?
Practicing magic, of course! Although what you see is purely cosmetic...
there has been no need for fighting magic in these realms for quite some time.
Would you like to put your skills to the test in an actual fight?
Are you challenging me? Well of course!
And you dare bring this foul, blood-sucking abomination into my place?
Wait, I -
I will strike you down, witness true power!
Gandalf swings his arms, and speaks in tongues incomprehensible to you.
A small tornado starts taking shape between the both of you.
Unbeknownst to the wizard, it knocks over a book from a shelf above him.
Stop the book from hitting Gandalf!

nodes.qte: qte_up qte_up qte_a qte_down qte_left qte_y qte_x qte_a qte_up qte_down
nodes.title: QuickTimeEvent

text.ENG: You jump to tackle Gandalf. He is confused, but can't react.
The heavy book just barely misses the wizard.
I forbit this tasteless acti-
He realizes what you've done.
Y... You aren't here to fight?
And you need my help?
Well, if you're willing to-
Gandalf immediately packs his things and stands readily in front of you.
What is this brute fighting style?
Not at all. We are in dire need of help to fight crimes against time itself.
You didn't even have time to finish your sentence.
Of course I am willing! Why the holdup?
You see Drakula and Gandalf exchanging awkward looks.
Are you sure he will come with? He brought but misery over these lands.
Nonesense. He's no more harm than a wizard knocking himself out with his own spells.
With a disgusting sound the book strikes the wizard's head.
There he lies, not dead, but clearly knocked out for quite a while.
"Magic spells to inflict blunt force trauma".
I feel like there's a joke in there somewhere.
You take a look at the book.
He's not coming back for a few hours, that's for sure.
Looks like we will have to skip this one.
I hope he's fine...
You leave the tower, its beautiful lights now extinguished.
As you come closer to the light to the end of the tunnel...
Peek inside the villa.
Head up into the mysterious tower.
Continue onward.
Where shall your journey take you?
You leave the tower, every step accompanied with beautiful lights and birdsong.
Who are you? I'm sorry for disturbing this late into the night...
The time stealer is ready...
You will not spend any more time in these life-draining fields. There are more pressing matters at hand.
Having exhausted all possible options, you head towards the main city.
We need all the help we can get, isn't that true? I heard this place is home to truly great fighters.
As you begin to walk, Drakula strikes up a conversation about a place nearby.
are you?
It is the ninja village.
You follow his lead as he begins to describe the beautiful architecture of their houses.
